comments.raw_text:
GTK likely has some keybinding for ctrl_shift+a for text entry widgets. GTK source suggests ctrl+shift+a means Unselect All.

We don't implement an 'unselect all' command so nothing happens. The fix here is either to implement unselect all, or, if possible, don't just ignore unsupported commands and handle the keypresses instead.
